thread.title: 'American Horror Story: Hotel' Opening Credits Get Biblical
thread.title_full: 'American Horror Story: Hotel' Opening Credits Get Biblical

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'American Horror Story: Hotel' Opening Credits Get Biblical
text:
Comments The creepy main title sequence that teases what's inside the titular hotel includes the Ten Commandments. 
Less than a week before the " American Horror Story : Hotel" premiere, the main title sequence is released online for viewing pleasure. Series co-creator Ryan Murphy has always said that the opening credits are filled with clues, so fans may get more hints at what will happen this season. The minute-long sequence teases what's waiting inside the titular Hotel Cortez. Blood drips everywhere, the guests are lusting after one another, and people hiding inside mattress will surprise everyone lying on it. There are also shots of scary kids and skeletons, while the actors' names flash in between the Ten Commandments. A new teaser featuring Wes Bentley 's John Lowe has also been debuted, showing him walking through the hallway of the hotel. Lowe is a detective who checks into the titular hotel to investigate a string of grisly murders. "Hotel", set to kick off Wednesday, October 7 on FX, features Lady GaGa as Countess Elizabeth, a blood-hungry character who is described as a very wealthy social doyenne consumed with art and fashion and people. She has bought the titular hotel which was built by Evan Peters ' psychotic James March in 1930. Matthew Bomer , Angela Bassett , Naomi Campbell , Kathy Bates , Finn Wittrock , Denis O'Hare and Max Greenfield are among other actors starring in the new installment of the hit anthology series.
